channel.title: Java heap error... amnd yes i searched for it
channel.description:
-Uses TestScape-
When i log in it doesnt say that but if anyone else tries that happens(I have a large server with tons of stuff I added) heres my runserver:
@echo off java -cp .;./jython.jar server java -Xmx3000m client
and I also tried adding
java -Xmx5000m characters java -Xmx5000m savedgames
but it still doesnt help...
I'm trying disk cleanup now to help add some space but does any one know whats wrong?
also how do you do the code thing on forums were your words are in code box
thanks

item.title: Java heap error... amnd yes i searched for it
item.dc:creator: @krawks12 krawks12
item.description:
@krawks12 wrote:

yeah its not like I have an old computer that doesnt have that kind of room…Ive even tried changing it to

-Xmx99999m client but with the 99999 going on for about 7 or 8 lines and it didnt do a thing…[br][size=1]Posted at: September 11, 2006, 07:57:33 PM[/size][hr]also i recenly had the problem:

code to large
public void parseIncomingPackets(){

and added
public void parseIncomingPackets2(){
and moved stuff to it
the stuff i moved to it stoped working…meaning thats a bunch of bull shit about adding a second one and having it actually work

Read full topic

item.title: Java heap error... amnd yes i searched for it
item.dc:creator: @ipkyouhaha ipkyouhaha
item.description:
@ipkyouhaha wrote:

yup i get the same thing everyone says add java -Xmx500m client or whatever, but it doesnt work…i havnt found a fix for this, but obviously there is one because there are servers out there that have like 50 people on at once and im sure never get that error, so im with krawks here, can anyone help us?!

Read full topic

When i log in it doesnt say that but if anyone else tries that happens(I have a large server with tons of stuff I added)

java -cp .;./jython.jar server
java -Xmx3000m client

java -Xmx5000m savedgames
